vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλεάζαρ(Heb. אֶלְעָזָר), ὁ, indecl.,
Eleazar: Mat.1:15.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, first mentioned at Mat.1.15;
son of: Eliud (G1664);
father of: Matthan (G3157)
§ Eleazar, "God [El] is a help"
Eleazar, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利亞撒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝的幫助"
耶穌基督祖先之一
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以利亚撒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝的帮助"
耶稣基督祖先之一
